text: Maps to the Stars is a 2014 satirical and drama movie. It was directed by David Cronenberg. This movie is about two former child stars and about the relationship of the entertainment industry with western civilization as a whole. Havana is played by Julianne Moore. Dr. Stafford is played by John Cusack. The movie received mostly positive reviews from critics, and performances from the cast were praised. It was released in May 2014. Category:Canadian drama movies Category:2014 drama movies Category:Movies directed by David Cronenberg
title: Maps to the Stars
